longBusinessSummary: Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited produces and distributes polyethylene terephthalate (PET), purified terephthalic acid (PTA), paraxylene, isophthalic acid, ethylene oxide and ethylene glycol, naphthalene dicarboxylate (NDC), polyester fibers and yarns, and wool products. It operates in five segments: Integrated PET, Integrated Oxides and Derivatives, Fibers, Specialty Chemicals, and Packaging. \The company produces various PET resins, including hot fill, low and high IV, heavy metal free, plant PET, fast re-heat, and general grade products to serve beverages, pharmaceuticals, homecare, and industrial packaging applications, as well as PET packaging materials, such as PET preforms, bottles, and closures. It also provides ethylene glycol used as raw material in the production of polyester fibers, PET, antifreeze, films, and chips; monoethylene glycol for use in polyester polymer production and antifreeze industry; diethylene glycol for unsaturated polyester resin, polyurethanes, and liquid detergent production, as well as cement grinding; triethylene glycol for oil and gas industry and natural gas dehydration; and ethylene oxide. In addition, the company offers polyolefin and polyester fibers, yarns, and chips for various market verticals, such as non-woven, home textile, technical textile, automotive, and apparel; and bicomponent fibers. Further, it produces worsted wool yarns that are used in various applications, such as woven and non-woven products, active apparels, and technical and interior textiles. The company operates in Thailand, North America, Europe, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Indorama Ventures Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Indorama Resources Limited.
address2: 37th Floor Soi Sukhumvit 19 (Wattana), Asoke Road Klongtoey Nuer, Wattana
